the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Public	O
Offering	O

to,	O

of	O

Hong	O
Kong	O
Public	O

that	O

on	O
offers	O
of	O
the	O
Offer	O

described	O
in	O
this	O
prospectus.	O

to	O

offering	O
of	O

or	O

any	O

other	O
than	O
Hong	O
Kong.	O

does	O

Grounds	B-SKIP
for	I-SKIP
Termination	E-SKIP

The	O
Sole	B-TITLE
Bookrunner	E-TITLE
may	O
(for	O
itself	O
and	O
on	O
behalf	O
of	O
the	O
other	O
Public	O
Offer	O
Underwriters)	O
by	O
giving	O
written	O
notice	O
to	O
our	O
Company,	O
terminate	O
the	O
Public	O
Offer	O
Agreement	O
if	O
prior	O
to	O
8:00	O
a.m.	O
on	O
the	O
Listing	O
Date:	O
(a)	O
there	O
develops,	O
occurs,	O
exists	O
or	O
comes	O
into	O
effect:	O
(i)	O
any	O
new	O

for	I-SKIP

or	O

a.m.	O
(Hong	O
Kong	O
time)	O
on	O

Coordinator	O

of	I-SKIP
Review	E-SKIP

Kong	O
Standard	O
on	O

2410	O
"	O

Review	O

the	O

of	O
the	O

2410	O

)	O

Kong	O
Institute	O

Public	O
Accountants.	O
A	O
review	O
of	O
these	O
condensed	O
consolidated	O
financial	O
statements	O
consists	O
of	O
making	O

of	O
persons	O
responsible	O
for	O
financial	O
and	O
accounting	O
matters,	O
and	O

and	O

review	O
procedures.	O
A	O
review	O
is	O
substantially	O
less	O
in	O
scope	O
than	O
an	O
audit	O
conducted	O
in	O
accordance	O
with	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Standards	O
on	O
Auditing	O
and	O
consequently	O
does	O
not	O
enable	O
us	O
to	O
obtain	O
assurance	O
that	O
we	O
would	O
become	O
aware	O
of	O
all	O
significant	O
matters	O
that	O
might	O
be	O
identified	O
in	O
an	O
audit.	O
Accordingly,	O
we	O
do	O
not	O
express	O
an	O
audit	O
opinion.	O

Agreement	E-SKIP

The	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Agreement	O
was	O
entered	O
into	O
on	O
17	O
March	O
2021.	O
As	O
described	O
in	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Agreement,	O
we	O
are	O
offering	O
initially	O
12,500,000	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Offer	O
Shares	O
(subject	O
to	O
adjustment)	O
for	O
subscription	O
by	O
the	O
public	O
in	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
on	O
the	O
terms	O
and	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
conditions	O
of	O
this	O
prospectus	O
and	O
the	O
Application	O
Forms	O
at	O
the	O
Offer	O
Price.	O

to	O
the	O
Listing	O
Committee	O
granting	O
the	O
listing	O
of,	O
and	O
permission	O
to	O
deal	O
in,	O
our	O
Shares	O
in	O
issue	O
and	O
to	O
be	O
issued	O
under	O
the	O
Global	O
Offering,	O
and	O
to	O
certain	O
other	O
conditions	O
set	O
out	O
in	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Agreement,	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Underwriters	O
have	O
agreed	O
severally	O
to	O
subscribe	O
and/or	O
procure	O
subscriber(s)	O
to	O
subscribe	O
for	O
in	O
cash	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Offer	O
Shares	O
which	O
are	O
being	O
offered	O
but	O
are	O
not	O
taken	O
up	O
under	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Public	O
Offering.	O

Hong	O
Kong	O
Agreement	O
is	O
conditional	O
upon	O
and	O

to,	O
among	O
other	O
things,	O
the	O
due	O
execution	O
of	O

HONG	B-SKIP
KONG	I-SKIP
UNDERWRITERS	E-SKIP

The	O
Global	O
Offering	O
comprises	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Public	O
Offering	O
of	O
initially	O
40,000,000	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Offer	O
Shares	O
and	O
the	O
International	O
Offering	O
of	O
initially	O
360,000,000	O
International	O
Offer	O
Shares,	O
subject,	O
in	O
each	O
case,	O
to	O
adjustment	O
on	O
the	O
basis	O
as	O
described	O
in	O
"Structure	O
of	O
the	O
Global	O
Offering"	O
in	O
this	O
prospectus	O
as	O
well	O
as	O
to	O
the	O
Over-allotment	O
Option	O
(in	O
the	O
case	O
of	O
the	O
International	O
Offering).	O

This	O
prospectus	O
is	O
published	O
solely	O
in	O
connection	O
with	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Public	O
Offering.	O
The	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Public	O
Offering	O
is	O
fully	O
underwritten	O
by	O
the	O
Hong	O
Kong	O
Underwriters	O
on	O
a	O
conditional	O
basis.	O
The	O
International	O
Offering	O
is	O
expected	O
to	O
be	O
fully	O
underwritten	O
by	O
the	O
International	O
Underwriters.	O
If,	O
for	O
any	O
reason,	O
the	O
Offer	O
Price	O
is	O
not	O
agreed	O
between	O
our	O
Company	O
and	O
the	O
Joint	O
Global	O
Coordinators	O
(for	O
themselves	O
and	O
on	O
behalf	O
of	O
the	O
Underwriters),	O
the	O
Global	O
Offering	O
will	O
not	O
proceed	O
and	O
will	O
lapse.	O

for	I-SKIP

8:00	O
a.m.	O
on	O
the	O
Listing	O
Date:	O
(i)	O
there	O
shall	O
develop,	O
occur,	O
exist	O
or	O
come	O

(a)	O
